Key Match Events: England conceded their biggest ever ODI total and fell 229 runs short in a crushing defeat to South Africa
Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and chose to bowl
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler admitted that bowling first was potentially a mistake
Aiden Markram, the South Africa captain, spoke of his team's all-round performance and their satisfaction with their comeback after the loss to the Netherlands
Others: The match was played in Mumbai, India
The weather conditions were hot and humid
The pitch was flat and the boundaries were short
